channel.title: X86 Error when logging in, works fine with x64 though
channel.description:
So I decided to use my x64 loader as my base for my x86 project and I added the other libs to make it all work correctly it runs fine but whenever I try to log in it gives me an error that doesn't happen on x64.
There isn't any obvious reason on why it's doing this as it was working fine but as soon as I changed the architecture it just no longer let me log in, Thanks for any help.
![DEED4583-89FF-4B62-9423-A6E343BA1166|272x500](upload://wqqpQwKn6k9nl0QUAkCz0c2V38e.jpeg)
